section_intro.description: As an avid learner, I am constantly exploring the possibilities of computer programming and am passionate about creating with code. With a solid foundation in programming and software development skills acquired through my education, I have gained experience writing a diverse range of scripts and classes. From managing collisions in a video game to automating tasks by renaming every file in a folder, I have tackled a variety of challenges. Even in my professional roles in IT and Technical Support, I leveraged my programming knowledge to create functional web pages and automate workflows. I am confident that the following projects I have worked on showcase the depth and variety of my programming expertise.

project_categories.title: School Projects
project_categories.description: Some old college projects I made with classmates years ago.

section_two.title: My Skills
section_two.description: While the projects above might help display some of my skills, here is a more comprehensive list of some important ones.

skills.description: I am able to pick up new languages quickly, I frequently use C#, and I am experienced in many other languages as well.
Keeping code organized and documented keeps me sane and allows me to pick up projects after months of not working on them.
I am flexible about my role and responsibilities, great with communication and taking initiative, and always encourage my teammates.
I have experience with AWS, Oracle, Mongo DB, and SQL Server.
